hymn.title: The heavens and the earth God made

layout.singingstanza: The heav -- en and the earth God made. Foun -- da -- tions of the earth He laid. And His great pow -- er was dis -- played— The an -- gels sang for joy. The an -- gels sang for joy, The an -- gels sang for joy, The heav -- ens and the earth God made, The an -- gels sang for joy.

lyrics.stanza: The heaven and the earth God made. Foundations of the earth He laid. And His great power was displayed— The angels sang for joy.
The angels sang for joy, The angels sang for joy, The heavens and the earth God made, The angels sang for joy.
The earth became as dark as night, And then God said, Let there be light, And there was light, yes, there was light, And God saw it was good.
And God saw it was good, And God saw it was good, Let there be light: and there was light, And God saw it was good.
